[https://adventofcode.com/2018/day/1](https://adventofcode.com/2018/day/1)



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
dt <- fread("input.txt")
head(dt)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
      V1
   <int>
1:   -14
2:    15
3:     9
4:    19
5:    18
6:    14
```


:::
:::



## Part 1



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
sum(dt$V1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 425
```


:::
:::



## Part 2



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
breakFlag <- FALSE
re_pete <- 1
while (!breakFlag) {
  vec <- cumsum(rep(dt$V1, re_pete))
  
  twice <- vec[duplicated(vec)]
  
  if (length(twice >= 1)) {
    print(twice[1])
    breakFlag <- TRUE
  } else {
    re_pete <- re_pete + 1
  }
}
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] 57538
```


:::
:::
